main event: A witness observed a brilliant white object moving in a straight line to the north for approximately 5-10 seconds.
interesting points: The object was very bright with no trail or sound., The sighting lasted only 5-10 seconds., The witness reported the object as possibly being a meteor or balloon., The object was observed while walking near Circular airport., The witness estimated the speed of the object at 600 m.p.h.
witness description: A civilian walking near an airport.
